description.value:
Seven star-like motes of light appear and orbit your head until the spell ends. Once per round, you can use a free action to send one of the motes streaking toward one creature or object within 120 feet of you. When you do so, make a ranged spell attack that deals 4d12 points of spirit damage. Whether you hit or miss, the mote is expended. You can make additional attacks with the motes by using a standard action. The spell ends early if you expend the last mote. While the motes remain, they shed bright light like a torch.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-warlock.warlock-effects.Item.hqIwO214cDIZ4hRw]{Spell Effect: Crown of Stars}

Heightened (+1) The number of motes increases by 2.
